data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bomi, Liberia not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bomi, Liberia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Bomi, Liberia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Bomi, Liberia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Bomi, Liberia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 9,820 believers in Bomi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Gola people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Gola people.
Father, let the threatened of Bomi, Liberia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Bomi. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Bomi, Liberia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

location.name: Bomi
location.people_groups_list: Maan, Gbii, Mende, Grebo, Gboloo, Bandi
